items.text: We highly recommend Simon for his professionalism. The work was done to a great standard, in little time and with minimum disruption. We hope to use Simon again.

Cannot recommend Simon and his work enough. Not only did we have a fractured pipe that had caused damage requiring repair but the floor installation only 10 months before was below standard. We're so happy with the results.
Simon was friendly and professional. The flooring looks amazing. We are really happy with his suggestions on the pattern and boarders. Would highly recommend
Very happy with the quick professional work carried out with our new flooring , would recommend , on time, knew what he was doing and very happy with the end result !! Alex

G floors fitted Amtico limestone tile effect flooring in our cloakroom and our ensuite bathroom. Both rooms were completed on the same day to a very high standard, at a fair price and we are absolutely delighted.
Impressed by the quality of work, reliability and helpful advice given. Simon was also flexible with helping us still use our kitchen and house as much as possible while the work was going on.
